title: Funding Open Source Software
description: Explore effective strategies and platforms for funding open source projects. Learn about crowdfunding, sponsorships, grants, and innovative models like license tokenization to sustain and grow open source initiatives.
keywords: Open Source Funding, Crowdfunding for Open Source, Open Source Sponsorships, Open Source Grants, License Tokenization, GitHub Sponsors, Bountysource, Open Collective, Kickstarter, Indiegogo, Open Source Development
